ygData.subject: Dual Bard Invisibility Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve read on the Bard Song Analysis page, that in a 2 bard party, you cannot have one singing invisibility, and the other singing any other song (such as
ygData.messageBody:
I've read on the Bard Song Analysis page, that in a 2 bard party, you cannot
have one singing invisibility, and the other singing any other song (such as
healing, or see invis, etc.)

Quotes:

"[Ziann] With 2 bards in the group... if you get separated and both are singing
invis you will go visible for a pulse when meeting up. Also on the same note
you can not have 2 bards singing invis at the same time as both bards will go
visible on the song pulses. This can be deadly when you are deep in a place
like Mistmoore Castle."

"[Kaearia] Any song will allow mobs to see you even if you are still
invisible. e.g. If one bard is singing this song, and another is singing Hymn,
the mobs can see you."

However, my experience in a 2 bard party last night would seem to indicate
differently. We seemed to be invis, and healing at the same time.

Has anyone done any tests with this?

- Reed (E'ci)
